'''Fredegar Chubb''' is a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]] who appears in the [[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey (extended edition)|Extended Edition]] of ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]].'' [[Bilbo Baggins]] visited the market outside of the [[Green Dragon]] Inn shortly after [[Gandalf]]'s visit and bought a fish from Fredegar while there. He was portrayed by [[Eric Vespe]].
